thread.title: Preschool sends mother 'condescending' note in lunch box
thread.title_full: Preschool sends mother 'condescending' note in lunch box

title: Preschool sends mother 'condescending' note in lunch box
text: 'It is a sometimes food': Preschool sends mother 'condescending' note because she sent her four-year-old daughter in with cake in her lunch box A mother found a 'condescending' note in her daughter's lunchbox after school The note said the cake in her daughter's lunch box was a 'sometimes food' The school also offered to help the mother with 'healthy food alternatives' The mother, Jessica Gianoni, was unimpressed and said it's her choice 'She had fruit including a banana, a sandwich and rice crackers,' she added Have you received one of these notes? FemailAU@mailonline.com Published: 23:17 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 23:20 GMT, 21 February 2017 21 shares
